AD_Warning_Assault.synopsis:
A player hurt a party follower (i.e, not an origin nor a generic avatar). Not recorded. Preferably provide multiple alternatives. Triggers on about 1 in 5 attacks.
The second speaker shouldn't say anything (they're under player control). They're just included in case you want to perform tag checks on them. See also GLO_Companions_PAD_Warning_Assault

AD_Warning_Assault_0.speaker: GROUP_Animals, GROUP_Bugbear, GROUP_Constructs, GROUP_Daisy, GROUP_Demons, GROUP_Desire, GROUP_Dragons, GROUP_Dwarves, GROUP_Elves, GROUP_Gith, GROUP_Gnolls, GROUP_Gnomes, GROUP_Goblins, GROUP_HalfElves, GROUP_Halflings, GROUP_Hobgoblin, GROUP_Humans, GROUP_Ogres, GROUP_Origins, GROUP_SmartUndead, GROUP_Tiefling, GROUP_Trolls
